name: 07-Expected-Days-For-Delivery-Regression-DRF-Model-Predictions-Business-View
parameters: --var uploadFile=[object Object] --var destinationPath=data/MANUFACTURING/Supply-Chain-OTIF-Analysis/Upload/DRF-Regression-Test-Upload.csv --var predictions=daysForDelivery --var selectClassificationModel=decisionTree --var select2=1_PO_MA_DaysDiff,1_PO_MA_MinsDiff,2_MA_PS_DaysDiff,2_MA_PS_HoursDiff,2_MA_PS_MinsDiff,3_PS_PC_HoursDiff,3_PS_PC_MinsDiff,purchaseorder_received_date_dt_month,purchaseorder_received_date_dt_dayofmonth,purchaseorder_received_date_dt_hour,purchaseorder_received_date_dt_minute,materials_availablity_date_dt_dayofmonth,materials_availablity_date_dt_hour,materials_availablity_date_dt_minute,production_started_date_dt_month,production_started_date_dt_dayofmonth,production_started_date_dt_minute,production_completed_date_dt_month,production_completed_date_dt_dayofmonth,production_completed_date_dt_hour,production_completed_date_dt_minute,1_PO_MA_HoursDiff --var submit1=true --var destinationPath=data/MANUFACTURING/Supply-Chain-OTIF-Analysis/Upload/DRF-Regression-Test-Upload.csv --var selectClassificationModel=randomForest --var submit5=true --var destinationPath=data/MANUFACTURING/Supply-Chain-OTIF-Analysis/Upload/DRF-Regression-Test-Upload.csv --var selectClassificationModel=h2oDistributedRandomForest --var submit7=true

shipment shipped date in days)

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    AVG(ABS(4_PC_SS_DaysDiff - prediction)) AS MAE,
    AVG(POWER(4_PC_SS_DaysDiff - prediction, 2)) AS MSE,
    SQRT(AVG(POWER(4_PC_SS_DaysDiff - prediction, 2))) AS RMSE,
    1 - (SUM(POWER(4_PC_SS_DaysDiff - prediction, 2)) / SUM(POWER(4_PC_SS_DaysDiff - avg_actual, 2))) AS R2
FROM (
    SELECT
        4_PC_SS_DaysDiff,
        prediction,
        AVG(4_PC_SS_DaysDiff) OVER () AS avg_actual
    FROM
        fire_temp_table
) subquery;
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run
